testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
And I choose creating new assignment in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
And Assignment Editor is opened
When I enter valid information for the assignment "Different Types of Questions Test"
And I click on the questions tab
And I click the new question button
And I enter valid information for the question name as "Test List Question"
And I see the ckeditor
And I click inside the question text editor
And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
And I choose "List" link from the dialog
And I click the drop down menu radio button for a list question
And I set the value to "0" for list response "1"
And I set the weight to "1.0" for list response "1"
And I set the value to "@" for list response "2"
And I set the weight to "0.0" for list response "2"
And I set the value to "−∞" for list response "3"
And I set the weight to "0.0" for list response "3"
And I click OK
And I save & close the new question in the assignment editor
And I choose to create a new question from the Add dropdown button
And I enter valid information for the question name as "Test Random Question"
And I see the ckeditor
And I save & close the new question in the assignment editor
And I save & close the assignment on the questions page
And I see summary of the assignment
And I save and close the assignment summary details
Then the new assignment "Different Types of Questions Test" is visible in its own expanded column
When I navigate to the System Homepage
And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
And I launch the "Different Types of Questions Test" assignment in "Student Readiness" unit
When I select the "0" value for list question "0"
And I use "Next" button to navigate to "Question 2"
And I use "Back" button to navigate to "Question 1"
Then I see the "0" value is selected for list question "0"
When I submit the assignment
Then my score 1 out of 1 (100 %) is shown in a grade report
classMethod
